languages.text: "У кого достаточно ресурсов, знания и могущества, чтобы осуществить такую работу?! Даже сам Благославенный Амарнат вряд ли смог бы. И он не стал бы уничтожать знания".
"Who has the resources, the knowledge, and the power to accomplish such a feat? It would have been beyond the capabilities of the blessed Amarnat himself. And he would never destroy knowledge."
languages.original_text: "У кого достаточно ресурсов, знания и могущества, чтобы осуществить такую работу?! Даже сам Благославенный Амарнат вряд ли смог бы. И он не стал бы уничтожать знания".

traits.locale_text: "Who has the resources, the knowledge, and the power to accomplish such a feat? It would have been beyond the capabilities of the blessed Amarnat himself. And he would never destroy knowledge."
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

traits.locale_text: "Who has the resources, the knowledge, and the power to accomplish such a feat? It would have been beyond the capabilities of the blessed Amarnat himself. And he would never destroy knowledge."
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

traits.locale_text: "Who has the resources, the knowledge, and the power to accomplish such a feat? It would have been beyond the capabilities of the blessed Amarnat himself. And he would never destroy knowledge."
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

traits.locale_text: "Who has the resources, the knowledge, and the power to accomplish such a feat? It would have been beyond the capabilities of the blessed Amarnat himself. And he would never destroy knowledge."
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: «¿Quién tiene los recursos, el conocimiento y el poder necesarios para semejante proeza? Es algo que estaría fuera del alcance incluso del bendito Amarnat. Y él nunca destruiría conocimientos».
languages.original_text: "Who has the resources, the knowledge, and the power to accomplish such a feat? It would have been beyond the capabilities of the blessed Amarnat himself. And he would never destroy knowledge."

traits.locale_text: «¿Quién tiene los recursos, el conocimiento y el poder necesarios para semejante proeza? Es algo que estaría fuera del alcance incluso del bendito Amarnat. Y él nunca destruiría conocimientos».
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: 「そのようなことができる資源や知識、そして力を持つ者は一体誰なのか？ 祝福されしアマルナト自身の能力を超えている。それに、彼は知識を破壊するようなことは絶対にしない」
languages.original_text: "Who has the resources, the knowledge, and the power to accomplish such a feat? It would have been beyond the capabilities of the blessed Amarnat himself. And he would never destroy knowledge."

traits.locale_text: 「そのようなことができる資源や知識、そして力を持つ者は一体誰なのか？ 祝福されしアマルナト自身の能力を超えている。それに、彼は知識を破壊するようなことは絶対にしない」
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: “哪个人有资源、知识和力量来完成这样的壮举？阿玛纳特本人是无法做到的，而且他绝对不会毁灭知识。”
languages.original_text: "Who has the resources, the knowledge, and the power to accomplish such a feat? It would have been beyond the capabilities of the blessed Amarnat himself. And he would never destroy knowledge."

traits.locale_text: “哪个人有资源、知识和力量来完成这样的壮举？阿玛纳特本人是无法做到的，而且他绝对不会毁灭知识。”
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: « Qui a les ressources, le savoir et la puissance nécessaires pour accomplir un tel exploit ? Même le bienheureux Amarnat en personne n'aurait pas pu y parvenir, et jamais il ne détruirait la moindre connaissance. »
languages.original_text: "Who has the resources, the knowledge, and the power to accomplish such a feat? It would have been beyond the capabilities of the blessed Amarnat himself. And he would never destroy knowledge."

traits.locale_text: « Qui a les ressources, le savoir et la puissance nécessaires pour accomplir un tel exploit ? Même le bienheureux Amarnat en personne n'aurait pas pu y parvenir, et jamais il ne détruirait la moindre connaissance. »
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: "Wer hat die Ressourcen, das Wissen und die Macht, um so etwas zu erreichen? Es hätte selbst die Möglichkeiten des gesegneten Amarnat überstiegen. Und er würde niemals Wissen zerstören."
languages.original_text: "Who has the resources, the knowledge, and the power to accomplish such a feat? It would have been beyond the capabilities of the blessed Amarnat himself. And he would never destroy knowledge."

traits.locale_text: "Wer hat die Ressourcen, das Wissen und die Macht, um so etwas zu erreichen? Es hätte selbst die Möglichkeiten des gesegneten Amarnat überstiegen. Und er würde niemals Wissen zerstören."
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: "Böyle bir şeyi başaracak kaynaklar, bilgi ve güç kimde olabilir ki? Yüce Amarnat'ın dahi elinden gelmeyecek bir iş bu. Ayrıca o, bilgiye asla zarar vermezdi."
languages.original_text: "Who has the resources, the knowledge, and the power to accomplish such a feat? It would have been beyond the capabilities of the blessed Amarnat himself. And he would never destroy knowledge."

traits.locale_text: "Böyle bir şeyi başaracak kaynaklar, bilgi ve güç kimde olabilir ki? Yüce Amarnat'ın dahi elinden gelmeyecek bir iş bu. Ayrıca o, bilgiye asla zarar vermezdi."
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek
